[00:00.00]Time Flies (Explicit) - Drake
[00:00.82]Lyrics by：Aubrey Graham/O. Yildirim
[00:01.65]Composed by：Aubrey Graham/O. Yildirim
[00:02.48]Yeah I'm outside in an AMG
[00:06.97]Right outside TT
[00:09.70]Too turnt baby girl you know me
[00:12.53]Still with the dogs that I grew besides
[00:15.22]All the n***as 'round me ride or they die
[00:18.14]Gotta watch the time 'cause it's flyin' right by
[00:20.85]I'm outside in an AMG
[00:23.61]Right outside TT
[00:26.36]Too turnt baby girl you know me
[00:30.61]Who am I
[00:31.90]All the n***as 'round me ride or they die
[00:34.78]Gotta watch the time 'cause it's flyin' right by
[00:37.43]Too turnt baby girl you know me
[00:42.99]I just called shorty on the face dawg
[00:45.83]Just threw on a hoodie it's a Crenshaw
[00:48.55]Way that I been livin' unconventional
[00:51.37]I'm just tryna make it to the engine though
[00:54.19]Certain things just started getting tense dawg
[00:56.91]Think we need to have us an intervention
[00:59.68]I can be your man but may be down the road
[01:02.45]Right now I would rather see my heart turn to chrome
[01:05.23]Rather see my heart turn crystal
[01:08.03]I can't even front like I don't miss ya
[01:10.77]Right now I'm just stuck inside the crib on my own
[01:13.53]Soon as I free up I'm boutta pop up on your phone
[01:16.07]Like I'm outside in an AMG
[01:19.11]Right outside TT
[01:21.88]Too turnt baby girl you know me
[01:26.02]Who am I
[01:27.41]All the n***as 'round me ride or they die
[01:30.20]Gotta watch the time 'cause it's flyin' right by
[01:32.97]Too turnt baby girl you know me
[01:38.61]Heart still on javelin baby
[01:41.32]Too turnt baby girl you know me
[01:44.08]I was pullin' off when they knew me
[01:46.89]Sometimes I wish there was two of me or three of me
[01:50.43]When it was you and me
[01:55.17]I felt like I loved you too much to change you
[01:58.20]You believe in angles more than angels
[02:00.91]Feel like I've been going through too much I explain to you
[02:03.71]But I'm still the same way I was when I came to you
[02:06.48]Everything I have what I had to exchange for you
[02:09.35]Everything I've been through I can't even complain to you
[02:11.93]Wish it stay the same for you sorry
[02:18.12]I'm sorry
[02:21.54]A-a-a-a
[02:22.95]I'm outside in an
[02:28.43]I'm I'm I'm I'm
[02:34.02]I'm outside in an
[02:39.52]I'm I'm I'm I'm

data.trans:
[ti:Time Flies (Explicit)]
[ar:Drake]
[al:Dark Lane Demo Tapes (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:00.82]//
[00:01.65]//
[00:02.48]我坐在外面的奔驰AMG里
[00:06.97]就在外面 双涡轮发动机
[00:09.70]太兴奋了 宝贝姑娘 你懂我的
[00:12.53]依然跟那些从小玩到大的兄弟在一起
[00:15.22]我身边的兄弟要么跟我混 要么自生自灭
[00:18.14]必须注意时间 因为时间飞逝不等人
[00:20.85]我坐在外面的奔驰AMG里
[00:23.61]就在外面 双涡轮发动机
[00:26.36]太兴奋了 宝贝姑娘 你懂我的
[00:30.61]我是谁
[00:31.90]我身边的兄弟要么跟我混 要么自生自灭
[00:34.78]必须注意时间 因为时间飞逝不等人
[00:37.43]太兴奋了 宝贝姑娘 你懂我的
[00:42.99]我刚刚联系了一个姑娘 兄弟
[00:45.83]穿上连帽衫 品牌是Crenshaw
[00:48.55]我的生活方式非传统
[00:51.37]我只想从一而终 走到最后
[00:54.19]有些事情开始变得有点紧张
[00:56.91]我觉得需要找人调解一下
[00:59.68]我可以做你的男人 但也可能会远去
[01:02.45]此时此刻 我宁愿我的心如铁石
[01:05.23]而不是像玻璃一样脆弱
[01:08.03]我不能装作我不想念你
[01:10.77]此时此刻 我一个人待在家里 不知所措
[01:13.53]一旦我重获自由 我就要给你打电话
[01:16.07]我坐在外面的奔驰AMG里
[01:19.11]就在外面 双涡轮发动机
[01:21.88]太兴奋了 宝贝姑娘 你懂我的
[01:26.02]我是谁
[01:27.41]我身边的兄弟要么跟我混 要么自生自灭
[01:30.20]必须注意时间 因为时间飞逝不等人
[01:32.97]太兴奋了 宝贝姑娘 你懂我的
[01:38.61]我的心依然很痛 宝贝
[01:41.32]太兴奋了 宝贝姑娘 你懂我的
[01:44.08]他们刚认识我 我就准备离开了
[01:46.89]有时候我希望自己能有一两个分身
[01:50.43]当你和我在一起
[01:55.17]我感觉我太爱你了 无法改变你
[01:58.20]你坚信自己的观点 不相信天使
[02:00.91]感觉我经历了太多太多 无法给你解释
[02:03.71]但我依然是和你相遇时候的那个我
[02:06.48]我愿意拿我的一切去换取你的真心
[02:09.35]我经历了那么多 我也不能对你抱怨
[02:11.93]真希望你能真心不变 对不起
[02:18.12]我很抱歉
[02:21.54]//
